abstract: Lumber Liquidators, responding to CBS News program report that it sells laminate flooring from China with high levels of formaldehyde, says it will give free indoor air quality test kits to consumers.
lead_paragraph: The air quality testing follows a news report that the retailer sold laminate flooring from China that violated safety limits.

headline.main: Lumber Liquidators Offers Flooring Customers Free Air Tests for Formaldehyde
headline.print_headline: Lumber Liquidators Offers Flooring Customers Free Air Tests for Formaldehyde

snippet: The air quality testing follows a news report that the retailer sold laminate flooring from China that violated safety limits.
